column4: hi,everybody , how to BATCH install ubuntu with 25 PC's :) , hardware completly alike ? :)
Thats the easy way... one of them
Ubuntu does not have the copy protection which is what keeps you from doing it with windows
Even if there are some differences with the hardware, you can still do it and it will or should auto detect.. at worst you have to reconfig xorg
Let me link cloning help for you...
You can also type man dd      are the drives all the same size?
Sorry, I was busy elsewhere..   Are you trying to copy windows as well?
I was trying to find a link I had for dd...  give me one more minute
http://wiki.linuxquestions.org/wiki/Dd                    let me know what you think of this option
ok , i think , maybe there is only way ... completely dd
Depending on how much stuff you are trying to include, you could create a tar on one or more dvd's
if use USB , there must be a 2-3G ...size
Yep  I have it on a 4 with plenty of spare room
Needless to say, you have a lot of options...
